${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:CaressingMoonlight.NAME: Caressing Moonlight
${modID}:CaressingMoonlight.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Trigger all ${modID}:Dot of the target.

${modID}:AllOutFootlightParade.NAME: All-Out Footlight Parade
${modID}:AllOutFootlightParade.DESCRIPTION: When attack enemy targets that are in the Weakness Broken state, the Toughness Reduction of this attack will be converted into 1 instance of Super Break DMG.

${modID}:StringSingsSlowSwirls.NAME: String Sings Slow Swirls
${modID}:StringSingsSlowSwirls.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate.NL Weakness Break Efficiency increases by 50%.

${modID}:PetalsToStreamReposeInDream.NAME: Petals To Stream, Repose In Dream
${modID}:PetalsToStreamReposeInDream.DESCRIPTION: Extend the duration of enemies' Weakness Break for one turn.

${modID}:VictoryRush.NAME: Victory Rush
${modID}:VictoryRush.DESCRIPTION: When an enemy is inflicted with Weakness Break, deal !M! ${modID}:Follow-Up damage.

${modID}:SlashedDreamCriesInRed.NAME: Slashed Dream Cries In Red
${modID}:SlashedDreamCriesInRed.DESCRIPTION: You can't play this card until you have 9 Slashed Dream. Deal 50 damage to all enemies.

${modID}:FyreflyTypeIVCompleteCombustion.NAME: Fyrefly Type-IV: Complete Combustion
${modID}:FyreflyTypeIVCompleteCombustion.DESCRIPTION: You can't play this card until you have 9 Slashed Dream. Deal 50 damage to all enemies.
